net.zer0bandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse

Class SQLightable.Reflection.Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zer0bandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLightable.Reflection.Column
  • Enclosing class:
    SQLightable.Reflection<T extends SQLightable>

    public class SQLightable.Reflection.Column
extends java.lang.Object
    A full reflection of a SQLiteColumn field. Used by SQLightable.Reflection. Replaces SQLiteHouse#getColumnDefinitionClause(QueryContext).
    Since:
    zer0bandwidth-net/android 0.1.7 (#50)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SQLiteColumn m_antColumn
      The annotation that defines the column schema.
      protected boolean m_bKey
      Indicates whether the column is also annotated as a key.
      protected java.lang.reflect.Field m_fldColumn
      The field that defines the column schema.
      protected Refractor m_lens
      The Refractor implementation to be used for the column.
      protected int m_nSince
      The version of the schema in which the column was added to the reflected table.

        Indicates whether the column is also annotated as a key.

      • m_lens

        protected Refractor m_lens
        The Refractor implementation to be used for the column.

      • m_nSince

        protected int m_nSince
        The version of the schema in which the column was added to the reflected table. This is the maximum of any since value in the annotations on the field's declaration, the enclosing class's declaration, or any SQLiteInheritColumns found while tracing the reflected class's lineage.
        Since:
        zer0bandwidth-net/android 0.2.1 (#56)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Column

        public Column(java.lang.reflect.Field fld)
       throws SchematicException,
              IntrospectionException
        Initializes the object with the selected field's data.
        Parameters:
        fld - the field to be analyzed
        Throws:
        SchematicException - if the field does not have a SQLiteColumn annotation
        IntrospectionException - if something goes wrong while analyzing the field

    • Method Detail

      • discoverRefractor

        protected Refractor discoverRefractor()
                               throws IntrospectionException,
                                      SchematicException
        Discovers the Refractor implementation to be used for this column field.
        Returns:
        the implementation which marshals this field's data
        Throws:
        IntrospectionException - if the refractor instance can't be created
        SchematicException - if the refractor class can't be resolved

      • getColumnCreationClause

        public java.lang.String getColumnCreationClause()
        Generates the SQL clause that will create this column as part of a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE ADD COLUMN statement.
        Returns:
        an SQL statement which defines the column

      • getSQLColumnValueFrom

        public java.lang.String getSQLColumnValueFrom(T o)
        Tries to discover the value of this column within the corresponding field of an instance of the schematic class that defines it.
        Parameters:
        o - an instance of the schematic class that defined this column
        Returns:
        the SQLite string representation of the value
        Throws:
        SchematicException - if something goes wrong while trying to discover the value
